name: DaVinci Resolve
description: Professional video editing and color grading software. DaVinci Resolve is used by Hollywood professionals and it's free.
longDescription: DaVinci Resolve is a professional video editing, color correction, visual effects, and audio post-production application. Used by Hollywood studios, it's available for free (with a paid Studio version for additional features). On Linux, it provides the same professional-grade tools used in major film productions. Whether you're editing YouTube videos or feature films, DaVinci Resolve has the power you need.

seo.description: Install DaVinci Resolve on Linux with OmniSet. Professional video editing and color grading used by Hollywood - completely free.
